String.Source: Galerion recounted how his father taught him to avert his eyes at every sign post and to speak with improper diction.
String.Dest: 加里兰描述了他的父亲教导他不要被各种记号所迷惑，说话要清晰准确。

String.Source: Let's go to the beginning. Tell me the 1st story.
String.Dest: 来我们从头开始。告诉我第一个故事。

String.Source: Most of all he warned him not to reference the tales he read, but more importantly, the cities, beasts, and forests contained therein.
String.Dest: 重要的是，他告诫他不要去引用他读到的传奇，但最最重要的是，不要提及里面出现的城市、猛兽和森林。

String.Source: Let's go to the beginning. Tell me the 1st story.
String.Dest: 来我们从头开始。告诉我第一个故事。

String.Source: For the spell would be broken the instant their Lord realized the boy knew things his eyes could not see.
String.Dest: 就在这个法术即将破灭殆尽的时候，他们的领主意识到自己看不穿这个男孩能看穿的东西。

String.Source: So why search for them, if scholars believe them worthless?
String.Dest: 那么为什么要去找它们呢，既然学者们认为它们毫无用处？

String.Source: There are some, however, who attribute the texts to a different origin. Not the young Trechtus, but the elder Vanus Galerion.
String.Dest: 不过有一些人，他们认为那些文献是从别处来的。不是年轻的崔特斯，而是老瓦纳斯·加里兰。

String.Source: So why search for them, if scholars believe them worthless?
String.Dest: 那么为什么要去找它们呢，既然学者们认为它们毫无用处？

String.Source: The theory states that Vanus wrote the text in the guise of his younger self, precisely so that scholars would question its authenticity.
String.Dest: 这个理论声明，瓦纳斯的这篇文章创作于他的青年时期是一个幌子，以至于学者们开始怀疑它的真实性。

String.Source: So why search for them, if scholars believe them worthless?
String.Dest: 那么为什么要去找它们呢，既然学者们认为它们毫无用处？

String.Source: By diverting the eyes of those who seek power, it provided an extra layer of security, in addition to the cryptic nature of the text itself.
String.Dest: 通过转移那些寻求力量的人的注意力，这给这份神秘的文献有上加上了一层额外的保险。

String.Source: Explain this theory.
String.Dest: 解释下这个原理。

String.Source: The majority of scholars are split between two disparate camps.
String.Dest: 大多学者分成了两个对立的阵容。

String.Source: Explain this theory.
String.Dest: 解释下这个原理。

String.Source: Some believe the texts are worthless scribbles written by a child, one who had yet to grasp the vastness of his destiny.
String.Dest: 一些人认为这些文献毫无价值，只是一个不知天文地理，参悟不透天命的小孩子的胡乱涂鸦。

String.Source: Explain this theory.
String.Dest: 解释下这个原理。

String.Source: Others contend the author is not Vanus himself, but a pretender hoping to profit from the mage's name.
String.Dest: 其他人推测作者并不是瓦努斯本人，而是一个企图从中渔利的冒充者。。

String.Source: Explain this theory.
String.Dest: 解释下这个原理。

String.Source: Both camps, however, are in agreement that the texts themselves have no intellectual merit.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，这两个阵营在判定这些文本有无学术价值一事上意见一致。

String.Source: Explain this theory.
String.Dest: 解释下这个原理。

String.Source: They are either an amusing reference for biographers and historians, or an elaborate hoax that vexes the very same.
String.Dest: 这些素材既可以在文学家和史学家笔下精彩生辉，也可以让恶作剧变得令人生厌。

String.Source: Tell the tale from the 5th and final text, and the last school of magic.
String.Dest: 从第五辑和最后一辑开始讲吧，最后的魔法学派。

String.Source: Vanus Galerion once ran with a group of troubadours. They performed from city to city, regaling crowds with their song and flair.
String.Dest: 有一次，万纳斯·加里兰加入了一伙吟游诗人，他们在城市间巡回演出，并给人们带去歌声与欢笑。

String.Source: Tell the tale from the 5th and final text, and the last school of magic.
String.Dest: 从第五辑和最后一辑开始讲吧，最后的魔法学派。

String.Source: One of them was a former jester, a man with deft hands. From out of the ether he would withdraw a bouquet of flowers, or a septim from your ear.
String.Dest: 他们其中一人曾是一名功夫了得的魔术师，能凭空变出一束花，或者从你耳朵里揪出个赛普汀。

String.Source: Tell the tale from the 5th and final text, and the last school of magic.
String.Dest: 从第五辑和最后一辑开始讲吧，最后的魔法学派。

String.Source: However, it was the group as a whole who cast a spell on the young boy, drawing a smile that had been lost to the void.
String.Dest: 然而，也就是这伙人为这个小男孩释放了一个法术，那是一个笑脸儿，随后在空气中慢慢的消散了。

String.Source: I've recovered the restoration pages.
String.Dest: 我已经找到回复的残页。

String.Source: Stupendous. I hope you did not cause too much collateral damage in procuring these.
String.Dest: 令人惊叹。我希望你搞定这些的时候没有造成什么间接损害。

String.Source: Olivia, about your father...
String.Dest: 奥莉薇雅，关于你的父亲……

String.Source: Dragonborn, this is not the time to concern yourself with personal matters. What did you discover at the site?
String.Dest: 龙裔，现在不是你关心你的个人问题的时候。快说说你在那个地方发现了什么？

String.Source: Confound it all...this page too...that makes five in total. This is unacceptable!
String.Dest: 乱七八糟......这页也是......最终制造出5份。这是令人难以接受的结果！

String.Source: My sincerest apologies, but I need time alone to think. Meet me in the Arcanaeum later if you have something you wish to discuss.
String.Dest: 向你致以我最诚挚的歉意，我现在需要时间去独立思考下。要是你想和我探讨点什么，待会儿来秘藏馆找我吧。

String.Source: You're back. What did you find?
String.Dest: 你回来了，你有什么发现吗？

String.Source: It's finally over. And I owe you my thanks. With the Radiant Dark finished, many of us will rest easy tonight. Living...and dead.
String.Dest: 终于结束了。我还欠你句感谢。黑暗光辉被终结了，我们中的很多人都可以放下重负。平凡地生活...然后死去。

String.Source: Did you find anything?
String.Dest: 有什么发现吗？

String.Source: I have news regarding your assistant.
String.Dest: 我有关于你的助手的消息。

String.Source: Well done. What have you learned?
String.Dest: 干得好！你有没有从中学到什么？

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: Let me see those...this is precisely what we needed. You have done admirably, as did my assistant in delivering these to you.
String.Dest: 让我看一下...哦这正是我们所需要的啊。你完成得太完美了，这些东西简直就像是我的助手转交给你的一样。

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: Now that you are entrenched in this matter, I have no doubt that you are the only one capable of pursuing it to the end.
String.Dest: 既然你在处理这个问题，只有你能结束这个事情。

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: This is far more perilous than the previous job, but I believe you will reward my confidence in you.
String.Dest: 这次的工作比你以前做的还要危险，不过我相信你一定可以完成。

String.Source: All right. What comes next?
String.Dest: 行了，然后怎么样了？

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: As you may have guessed, the five locations listed are likely secluded areas where the mages can conduct their individual research.
String.Dest: 你也许都猜到了，这五个地方很可能是法师们为了进行独立研究而寻找的僻静场所。

String.Source: All right. What comes next?
String.Dest: 行了，然后怎么样了？

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: One mage for each school of magic. To defeat them will require skill and cunning, and an understanding of the strengths and weaknesses of each art.
String.Dest: 若想击败每种学派的法师们，需要的不光是技巧和灵巧，还需要理解每种流派的优势和劣势。

String.Source: All right. What comes next?
String.Dest: 行了，然后怎么样了？

String.Source: He was able to procure these notes.
String.Dest: 他是有能力取得这些笔记的。

String.Source: The notes will provide their locations, and you can consult me for any advice regarding their procurement. Do you have any questions before you go?
String.Dest: 这笔记里提供了他们的位置，你可以向我咨询任何有关他们的事。你走之前还有什么疑问吗？

String.Source: I'm afraid Jadro'Ra is dead.
String.Dest: 我恐怕贾卓’拉已经死了。

String.Source: That is unfortunate. He was a good mage. Were you able to procure any information at all?
String.Dest: 真不幸，他是个好法师。你还能不能获得一些情报？

String.Source: Or you could maybe say goodbye.
String.Dest: 或者你也许应该说再见了。

String.Source: Yes...but I have had one too many today, and...I am all out of tears.
String.Dest: Yes...but I have had one too many today, and...I am all out of tears.

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: Three of the four, perhaps. My work is not yet complete, however. Nelos may be dead, but his ideals, research, and influence remain.
String.Dest: 大概四分之三吧，我还没有完成我的工作。虽然纳洛斯已经死了，但他的思想，研究， 影响还并没有消失。

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: If those are allowed to persist, then all is for naught.
String.Dest: 如果这些都得以保存，那一切努力都付诸流水了。

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: We are always teaching the next generation. Our voice must be an echo, or it will die like a whisper.
String.Dest: 我们总是在教育下一代。我们的教诲应像回声一样不断延续，而不是像轻语一般消逝在风中。

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: That is the measure of true progress.
String.Dest: 这是在权衡真正的进步。

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: In any event, we must make sure this area is clear. I will head over to the east wing.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我们必须确保这个区域是安全的。我将带头前往东面。

String.Source: Four of us, to be exact. Me, you, your father and Jadro'Ra.
String.Dest: 确切的说是我们四个，我，你，你父亲还有贾卓’拉。

String.Source: You head over to the entrance. We will meet back here.
String.Dest: 你去入口处看看。我们一会儿回到这里碰头。

String.Source: Not everyone can be as disciplined an educator as you.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都能成为像你这样的训练有素的教育者。

String.Source: Teaching is not a competition. It is a cooperative effort. Nelos' difficulties stemmed not from his methodology, but his desire.
String.Dest: 教学并不是竞争，而是师徒合作的成果。纳洛斯的困难并不源于他的方法，而是欲望使然。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: You would do well to consider the reasons why. Leadership is about more than power.
String.Dest: 你应该好好思考一下其中的真谛。领导能力包含的不单单只是力量。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: Nelos will tell you he gives his apprentices the freedom to make their own choices. The result is a complete lack of guidance.
String.Dest: 纳洛斯会跟你说，他会给他的学徒们自己作选择的自由。结果就是学徒们没有获得指导。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: As Arch-Mage, I hope you are taking note of his shortcomings.
String.Dest: 作为首席法师，我希望你能注意到他的缺点。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: Regardless, the Radiant Dark still pose an unmistakable threat. Yet with Vanus' spells, we will extinguish his rebellion before it has even begun.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，黑暗光辉还是做出一副他们极具威胁的样子。目前我们有了瓦纳斯的法术，可以在他们叛乱之前就击败他们。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: You would do well to consider the reasons why. Leadership is about more than power.
String.Dest: 你应该好好思考一下其中的真谛。领导能力包含的不单单只是力量。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: Nelos will tell you he gives his apprentices the freedom to make their own choices. The result is a complete lack of guidance.
String.Dest: 纳洛斯会跟你说，他会给他的学徒们自己作选择的自由。结果就是学徒们没有获得指导。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: The master wizards here would be wise to take note of his shortcomings.
String.Dest: 巫术大师看破了他的不足。

String.Source: The Radiant Dark are dysfunctional. They can't even agree on a philosophy.
String.Dest: 黑暗光辉很不正常。我甚至在理念上都无法认同他们。

String.Source: Regardless, the Radiant Dark still pose an unmistakable threat. Yet with Vanus' spells, we will extinguish his rebellion before it has even begun.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，黑暗光辉还是做出一副他们极具威胁的样子。目前我们有了瓦纳斯的法术，可以在他们叛乱之前就击败他们。

String.Source: I've recovered the alteration pages.
String.Dest: 我已经恢复了变化系的页面。

String.Source: That is tremendous news. If you are running low on potions, be sure to stock up at Birna's.
String.Dest: That is tremendous news. If you are running low on potions, be sure to stock up at Birna's.

String.Source: We could try to lure them here. Then torture them.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着在这里引诱他们。接着折磨他们。

String.Source: I know you are pleased with our victory, as am I. Yet I do not tolerate such statements, even in jest.
String.Dest: 我知道你为我们的胜利感到喜悦，我也是。然而我还是不喜欢这种说笑般的表述方式。

String.Source: We could try to lure them here. Then torture them.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着在这里引诱他们。接着折磨他们。

String.Source: Nevertheless, it is possible that some members were set to arrive here in the coming days.
String.Dest: 不过，未来几天还是有学徒可能到达这里的。

String.Source: We could try to lure them here. Then torture them.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着在这里引诱他们。接着折磨他们。

String.Source: If that happens, I will deal with them in the appropriate manner. In the meantime, I thank you, Dragonborn. For everything.
String.Dest: 要是那件事发生了，我会采用适当的方式解决他们。此刻，谢谢你，谢谢你为我们做的一切。

String.Source: Tell me about destruction mages.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲那个毁灭法师。

String.Source: The name destruction implies havoc, and while such magic is capable of immense damage, it is not as inelegant as one might presume.
String.Dest: 毁灭术这个名字就意味着破坏，尽管这类魔法能够造成极大的破坏性，但也不像人们所认为的那样粗鲁不雅。

String.Source: Tell me about destruction mages.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲那个毁灭法师。

String.Source: Lightning, ice, and fire. Each element has applications beyond the inflicting of pain.
String.Dest: 闪电，寒霜，还有烈火。每一种元素除了造成破坏与痛苦之外都有别的用途。

String.Source: Tell me about destruction mages.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲那个毁灭法师。

String.Source: A bolt of lightning can disarm a trained mage, sapping him of his magicka. The swiftest runner will find it difficult to wade through briars of ice.
String.Dest: 闪电箭可以搞定训练有素的法师，榨干他的法力。冰霜形成的荆棘则可以让最迅捷的跑者也无法穿越。

String.Source: Tell me about destruction mages.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲那个毁灭法师。

String.Source: Flames will turn your own tunic into a weapon, draining your health as it burns through your skin.
String.Dest: 火焰将你自的袍子转化成为武器，燃烧你的肌肤的同时吞噬你的生命力。

String.Source: Tell me about destruction mages.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲那个毁灭法师。

String.Source: To defeat a master of destruction magic, one must use their wards wisely, for there is more than just health one must account for.
String.Dest: To defeat a master of destruction magic, one must use their wards wisely, for there is more than just health one must account for.

String.Source: Had I known he was Jadro'Ra's killer, he would've died in that cottage.
String.Dest: Had I known he was Jadro'Ra's killer, he would've died in that cottage.

String.Source: Then it is fortunate you did not. You are a formdiable adversary, but I am not entirely sure you possess the means to kill him.
String.Dest: 你该庆幸你没那么鲁莽。你的确是个难缠的对手，但是我并不认为你有本事可以杀了他。

String.Source: He said he'd be waiting for you on the other side.
String.Dest: 他说过他会在另外一边等你。.

String.Source: The cat always did have a knack for stating the obvious. Indeed he will be waiting, and likely ignoring another task to do so.
String.Dest: 猫科动物显然都明白一个诀窍。等待时机，不按套路出牌。

String.Source: He said he'd be waiting for you on the other side.
String.Dest: 他说过他会在另外一边等你。.

String.Source: I will remind him of that when I see him.
String.Dest: 等我再见到他的时候我会提醒他的。

String.Source: I've recovered the conjuration pages.
String.Dest: 我已经修复了召唤部分的书页。

String.Source: Excellent. To defeat a conjurer is to defeat the armies of Oblivion and death. No small feat.
String.Dest: 干得漂亮。击败一个召唤师等同于击败了一只湮灭中的不死军队，这可是大功一件。。

String.Source: We must do what we can to protect the innocent.
String.Dest: 我们必须尽我们所能来保护无辜之人.

String.Source: I agree. Our principles will not win us this war, but without them we are no different than the ones we oppose.
String.Dest: 我同意，坚持我们的原则可能无法赢得战争，但是如果摒弃了它们，那我们就与我们与之战斗的东西毫无区别了。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Greetings, Arch-Mage.
String.Dest: 幸会，首席法师。
